lead_paragraph: An article on Sunday about the announcement that Curlin, the 2007 horse of the year, will not race next year misstated the legal status of two lawyers who are part of Midnight Cry Stable, a group that holds an ownership stake in the horse. The lawyers, who were not named in the article, are free on bond while awaiting a court date in a fraud case; they are not in jail.
